column1: Because of covid-19 all diveshops at koh tao are closed and the whale shark season is cancelled?See you next year!
Please be sure to advise the sharks.
They were Q'ing up to leave the Gulf........ Fish & Game doing health checks, so still a bit of a bottleneck
Will sharks get a refund or a voucher?

I find it sad that the trolls are taking pleasure in the island closing down, and amusing that they think whalesharks are in the loop about covid19.  I think the best time for whalesharks is May-June, so hopefully they'll reopen by then. Quarantine has me looking at all my old Tao pics, can't wait to go back.
I think June would be really optimistic. Actually September might even be. CV19 hasn't even run its course here yet.
